General.Name: Forgame Holdings Limited
General.Description: Forgame Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, develops, operates, and publishes web and mobile games in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It operates in two segments, Game Business and Electronic Device and Semiconductor Business. The company also trades in electronic devices and semiconductors. It also provides information technology and software development services. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.
